Cherrycake\Modules\HtmlDocument::Xredirect

Redirects to the given URL via the specified HTTP response code and ends execution

    Signature

    public function Xredirect(integer $code, string $location )

    Parameters

    $code — integer
    The code, from one of the available HTML_RESPONSE_CODE_NOT_* consts
    $location — string
    The Url to redirect
